concept.title: Segment Definitions
concept.shortdesc: The Segment Definition Builder allows you to define visitor segment filters based on visitor behavior.

conbody.p: You can use the Segment Definition Builder to create new segment filters or to edit an existing filter. When submitting a data warehouse request, you can apply a segment filter to the result set to analyze your website traffic. Segments created in data warehouse are also available in the ASI feature.
For example, the segment of visitors that purchased $300 during a sales promotion held during the past eight days is a segment filter.
